subject: FW: laypeng@baskcomm.com sent you a conversion tracking tag

full_threads.body:
@heath All good now on this one. I have added it on the functions file. Let me know if this works for you?

@jona +10mins Thanks!

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
@joel

We need to load this script:



On on this page: https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/remote-working-tips/

Do you know how best to do that?

Hi Heath

The team confirmed that the extra tracking script that you asked about, can be added to the following page

https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/remote-working-tips/ <https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/remote-working-tips/>

If you could add this that would be great. Original email below ☺

Cheers
Una


Una Mapes
Marketing Director

From: Faye Hugo <Faye@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:Faye@veldhoencompany.com>>
Date: Tuesday, 12 May 2020 at 11:27 am
To: Una McGeehan <una@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:una@veldhoencompany.com>>
Cc: Iolanda Meehan <Iolanda@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:Iolanda@veldhoencompany.com>>, Angela Huang <angela@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:angela@veldhoencompany.com>>
Subject: Re: laypeng@baskcomm.com <mailto:laypeng@baskcomm.com> sent you a conversion tracking tag

Hi Una,

Lay Peng just verified that Yes, the conversation tracker should go to the newsletter page (https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/remote-working-tips/ <https://www.veldhoencompany.com/en/remote-working-tips/>)

Also, she is wondering if you could share if any lead has been generated from our end?

Cheers,

Faye




From: Faye Hugo <Faye@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:Faye@veldhoencompany.com>>
Date: Monday, 4 May 2020 at 8:54 am
To: Una McGeehan <una@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:una@veldhoencompany.com>>
Cc: Iolanda Meehan <Iolanda@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:Iolanda@veldhoencompany.com>>, Angela Huang <angela@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:angela@veldhoencompany.com>>
Subject: Fw: laypeng@baskcomm.com <mailto:laypeng@baskcomm.com> sent you a conversion tracking tag



Hi Una,



Lay Peng, who is helping us with Google ads has requested for the below. Can you please advise?



Have a nice day!



Faye



From: Ng Lay Peng | Bask Communications <laypeng@baskcomm.com <mailto:laypeng@baskcomm.com>>
Sent: Monday, May 4, 2020 1:03 PM
To: Faye Hugo <Faye@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:Faye@veldhoencompany.com>>
Cc: Iolanda Meehan <Iolanda@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:Iolanda@veldhoencompany.com>>; Angela Huang <angela@veldhoencompany.com <mailto:angela@veldhoencompany.com>>
Subject: Fwd: laypeng@baskcomm.com <mailto:laypeng@baskcomm.com> sent you a conversion tracking tag



Hi Faye,



I've set up for both ads to run as of today. Display ad is pending Google's approval for the artwork.



I'm not sure if the website was previously set-up with a tracking code but if it's not, can you inject it in so that we are better able to track the conversion? Please see the email below for instructions :)



Thank you!!



Warmest Regards,

Ng Lay Peng | +65 9237 7316

http://www.baskcomm.com <http://www.baskcomm.com/>
<https://www.facebook.com/baskcomm> <https://www.linkedin.com/in/nglaypeng/> <https://www.instagram.com/baskcomm>



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Google Ads <ads-account-noreply@google.com <mailto:ads-account-noreply@google.com>>
Date: Mon, May 4, 2020 at 10:32 AM
Subject: laypeng@baskcomm.com <mailto:laypeng@baskcomm.com> sent you a conversion tracking tag
To: <laypeng@baskcomm.com <mailto:laypeng@baskcomm.com>>







laypeng@baskcomm.com <mailto:laypeng@baskcomm.com> sent you a conversion tracking tag

The Google Ads user laypeng@baskcomm.com <mailto:laypeng@baskcomm.com> has shared a tracking tag to track conversions on your website. To add this tag to your website, follow the instructions below.

How to use the tag
For conversion tracking to work, you'll need to install the conversion tracking tag, which consists of a global site tag and an event snippet. If installing the tag with Google Tag Manager, follow these instructions <https://www.google.com/appserve/mkt/p/AM7kBiXKQ8554kevDYPf_iZJcD5UALeW4bPxEm4tCrRr_LpNh_Qzfa9BwXtpbZeiBpxLJwPUHaWnkFKMQtm-1e2Xbr8CsaqkILQ50_lUKEULUQFJpWp-gK7hF_en> instead.
If any of your web pages are built using AMP, you'll need to add tags to both the AMP and HTML versions. Instructions are included for both.
HTML PAGES
Install the global site tag on every page of your website.
Open the HTML for each page.
Choose from the following options:
If you haven't installed the global site tag on your website, copy the tag below and paste it between the head tags (<head></head>):
<!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Ads: 990486009 --> <script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=AW-990486009 <https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=AW-990486009>"></script> <script> window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || []; function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);} gtag('js', new Date()); gtag('config', 'AW-990486009'); </script>

See more guidelines on setting up the global site tag <https://www.google.com/appserve/mkt/p/AM7kBiWFAQLwcWhWSAn01JPi03ZmQGU7DpROK4xbBM-7JRB7ujusvAHJcmIJfH-m-dC9lPR6CzIOh_9k95_3GRRhkh_a2ZKLfTzNl1wJ5A-CR6yJKlHElTHiQjt7>.

If you installed the global site tag on your website from another Google product (example: Google Analytics) or from another Google Ads account, copy the 'config' command below and add it to every instance of the global site tag, right above the </script> end tag.
gtag('config', 'AW-990486009');

If you or a manager account already installed the global site tag on your website while setting up the tag for another conversion action, make sure that the tag is on every page of your website and check that the 'config' command has this Google Ads account's conversion ID: AW-990486009
Save the changes to your webpages.

Install the event snippet on the conversion page. This is the page your customers reach on your website after they've completed a conversion — the "Thank you for your order" page, for example.
Open the HTML for the conversion page.
Copy the snippet below and paste it between the head tags (<head></head>) of the page, right after the global site tag.
<!-- Event snippet for Website traffic conversion page --> <script> gtag('event', 'conversion', {'send_to': 'AW-990486009/j0V1CPKSk88BEPm7ptgD'}); </script>

Save the changes to your webpage.
AMP PAGES
You should follow these instructions for any of the pages built using the AMP framework.
Install the global site tag on every page of your website.
Open the HTML for each page.
Choose from the following options:
If you haven't installed the global site tag on your website, add these two tags:
First, copy the tag below and paste it between the head tags (<head></head>), before the AMP JS library.
<script async custom-element="amp-analytics" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-analytics-0.1.js <https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-analytics-0.1.js>"></script>

Then, copy the tag below and paste it between the body tags (<body></body>) of all of your AMP pages
<!-- Global site tag (gtag) - Google Ads: 990486009 --> <amp-analytics type="gtag" data-credentials="include"> <script type="application/json"> { "vars": { "gtag_id": "AW-990486009", "config": { "AW-990486009": { "groups": "default" } } }, "triggers": { } } </script> </amp-analytics>

See more guidelines on setting up the global site tag <https://www.google.com/appserve/mkt/p/AM7kBiWFAQLwcWhWSAn01JPi03ZmQGU7DpROK4xbBM-7JRB7ujusvAHJcmIJfH-m-dC9lPR6CzIOh_9k95_3GRRhkh_a2ZKLfTzNl1wJ5A-CR6yJKlHElTHiQjt7>.
If you installed the global site tag on your website from another Google product (example: Google Analytics) or from another Google Ads account, copy the line below and include it in the "config" section of every instance of the global site tag.
"AW-990486009": { "groups": "default" }

If you or a manager account already installed the global site tag on your website while setting up the tag for another conversion action, make sure that the tag is on every page of your website and check that the "config" section has this Google Ads account's conversion ID: AW-990486009
Save the changes to your webpages.

Install the event snippet on the conversion page. This is the page your customers reach on your website after they've completed a conversion — the "Thank you for your order" page, for example.
Open the HTML for the conversion page.
Copy the snippet below and paste it into the "triggers" section of the global site tag.
"C_2sIAw_crCx8": { "on": "visible", "vars": { "event_name": "conversion", "send_to": ["AW-990486009/j0V1CPKSk88BEPm7ptgD"] } }

Save the changes to your webpage.
Learn more about adding a conversion tracking tag to your website <https://www.google.com/appserve/mkt/p/AM7kBiUxEYr1n7Eo26NT-PxOvCRhZ9OEPiDIZQmU538tfIUEXpsdKSet79PQ79HIGRnXJZ_smPOcC_Hau__JPwFv4F3gSDDFAY-tdsLLpSeQIxH2QoslZNJwktJ1>.
Thanks,

The Google Ads Team


This email was sent to update you about your Google Ads account.


Google LLC
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway,
Mountain View, CA 94043 <x-msg://83/#x_x_x_m_-5202488641792318773_>
